akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 100–297, title I, § 1003(a), Apr. 28, 1988, 102 Stat. 293

akn:content.akn:p:
§§ 3831, 3832. Repealed. Pub. L. 100–297, title I, § 1003(a), Apr. 28, 1988, 102 Stat. 293
Section 3831, Pub. L. 97–35, title V, § 576, Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 473, related to statement of purpose for program of educational improvement and support services.
Section 3832, Pub. L. 97–35, title V, § 577, Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 474, related to authorized activities.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective July 1, 1988, see section 6303 of Pub. L. 100–297, set out as an Effective Date of 1988 Amendment note under section 1071 of this title.
